company_context: HashiCorp | An IBM Company Skip to main content Do Cloud Right, Explained Explore our new series on accelerating delivery, optimizing ROI, and strengthening security at scale. Watch now Do cloud right Take a unified approach to hybrid cloud with Infrastructure and Security Lifecycle Management. Meet The Infrastructure Cloud TRUSTED BY LEADING ORGANIZATIONS HashiCorp Cloud Platform A smarter approach to infrastructure operations HashiCorp helps organizations do cloud right with The Infrastructure Cloud, an integrated platform that turns Infrastructure Lifecycle Management and Security Lifecycle Management into code, automates workflows, and serves as your central system of record. Whether you choose to implement it through the HashiCorp Cloud Platform or self-managed solutions — or a combination of the two — The Infrastructure Cloud automates provisioning, enforces policies, and standardizes how teams work across your hybrid environment. Learn more Learn more Learn more Try HCP Try HCP Try HCP HashiCorp Cloud Platform Get started in minutes Move faster and get more value from the cloud with all the right controls in place. The HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) is a unified suite of SaaS products that automate the lifecycle management of the infrastructure and security supporting your most critical applications. HCP powers The Infrastructure Cloud and is one of the most popular ways that organizations use HashiCorp products. Take control of your workflows with scalable, automated processes that reduce cloud infrastructure costs and risk while keeping you ahead of the competition. Here’s how HashiCorp helps you move faster and get more value from the cloud with all the right controls in one place. Accelerate Optimize Strengthen Accelerate delivery and innovation Go to market 5x faster without compromising security. HashiCorp helps you do cloud right with self-service tools, built-in guardrails, and automated workflows that accelerate app delivery across hybrid cloud environments. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours optimize their infrastructure and security lifecycle management. I came across HashiCorp and noticed you're using their cloud platform. Can you tell me a bit about your current setup and any challenges you're facing?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yeah. We've been using HashiCorp for a while now, and it's been working well for us. But I have to say, we're always looking for ways to improve our data processing capabilities. What makes DeepData AI unique compared to other solutions out there?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question. Our AI-powered engine allows for real-time data processing and analytics, which can help you make more informed decisions about your infrastructure and security. We've seen companies like yours reduce their cloud infrastructure costs by up to 30% and improve their overall efficiency. Would you like to hear more about how we can help?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm intrigued, but I have to say, we're in the middle of a big project right now and I'm not sure if we have the bandwidth to take on a new tool. Plus, I'm not sure if our current budget would accommodate the cost of DeepData AI. What kind of pricing are we looking at?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is competitive, and we offer customized plans based on the specific needs of each company. I'd be happy to discuss the details with you and see if we can find a plan that fits within your budget. As for the implementation, we have a dedicated team that can help with the onboarding process, and we've had great success with companies similar to yours.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate that, but I'm still not convinced. We've had issues with integrating new tools with our existing infrastructure in the past, and I don't want to take on that risk again. Can you tell me more about how DeepData AI integrates with HashiCorp and other tools we're using?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. We have a robust API that allows for seamless integration with a wide range of tools, including HashiCorp. We've had many customers successfully integrate our solution with their existing infrastructure, and we're confident we can do the same for you.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I understand, but I'm going to have to pass on this one. As the CTO, I don't have the authority to approve new tools or budgets, and our current priorities are focused on other areas. I appreciate the pitch, but I don't think DeepData AI is a good fit for us at this time.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Authority
Feedback: The seller should have asked about the buyer's decision-making process and authority earlier in the conversation to avoid investing time and effort into a pitch that ultimately couldn't be approved. Sentiment: Neutral
